results.title: Motivation through job enrichment (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: William C. Jersey, Howard Enders, Quest and BNA Communications
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Gellerman Motivation and Productivity Film”.
Discusses Herzberg’s “motivation hygiene” theory. Good pay, security, friendly supervision do not usually motivate people as well as job enrichment.
results.creator_credit_for_label: William C. Jersey, Howard Enders, Quest and BNA Communications

results.title: Theory X and theory Y: the work of Douglas McGregor. Part 2. Application of the theory (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: William C. Jersey, Richard L. Wormser, Quest and BNA Communications
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Gellerman Motivation and Productivity Film”
Discusses Douglas McGregor’s X and Y theories in which he attempts to show how one person’s influence on another person’s behaviour is believed to take place. How to apply theory y assumptions to management function. Based on books by Douglas McGregor.
results.title_for_label: Theory X and theory Y: the work of Douglas McGregor. Part 2. Application of the theory (TEFC)
results.creator_credit_for_label: William C. Jersey, Richard L. Wormser, Quest and BNA Communications

results.title: Geokids
results.creator_credit: Hank Saroyan, Caroline Somers, Bruce Somers Jnr and Lost Kitty Productions
results.brief_description: Created by Han Saroyan of the “Muppet babies”, this series features three amazingly life-like animal characters called Sunny, Bobby and Balzac. Small children are able to learn about many different types of animals and the way they behave.

results.title: Safe closing down procedures
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Gas Welding”
This program covers oxyacetylene equipment and closing down procedures. The material is presented as a step-by-step demonstration.
